_comments.ManualFields: List of fields used for loading static information from Sectigo as certificate Metadata in Keyfactor.
_comments.CustomFields: List of Custom Fields/Metadata Fields to be synced between Keyfactor and Sectigo.
_comments.sectigoFieldName: The name of the field in Sectigo. If manual field, an address into the Sectigo Certificate Details json response.
_comments.keyfactorMetadataFieldName: The name of the field in Keyfactor. This must not contain spaces, or a variety of other characters. Only [a-zA-Z0-9-_] fitting characters are accepted.
_comments.keyfactorDescription: A description of the metadata field for use with Keyfactor.
_comments.keyfactorDataType: The data type of the field. (1 = String, 2 = Integer, etc.)
_comments.keyfactorHint: A short hint to guide users on what to enter in the field, displayed in Keyfactor.
_comments.keyfactorValidation: A RegEx expression to validate the field's input. Only applicable for string fields.
_comments.keyfactorEnrollment: How the metadata field is handled in Keyfactor during certificate enrollment. String = 1, Integer = 2, Date = 3, Boolean = 4, MultipleChoice = 5, BigText = 6, Email = 7.
_comments.keyfactorMessage: A message to be displayed when validation fails.
_comments.keyfactorOptions: An array of values for multiple-choice fields. Ignored for other data types.
_comments.keyfactorDefaultValue: A default value for the field. Only applicable for certain data types.
_comments.keyfactorDisplayOrder: The order in which the field is displayed.
_comments.keyfactorCaseSensitive: Whether validation is case-sensitive. Only applicable for string fields with validation.

ManualFields.keyfactorDescription: Sectigo Cert Type ID For This Cert

CustomFields.keyfactorDescription: Another test field but with an integer.
